lead_paragraph: With more than $125 billion in acquisitions last year, more non-tech companies than ever are forgoing building technology in-house and acquiring start-ups.
snippet: With more than $125 billion in acquisitions last year, more non-tech companies than ever are forgoing building technology in-house and acquiring start-ups....

headline.main: For Non-Tech Companies, if You Can’t Build It, Buy a Start-Up
headline.print_headline: Outsiders Join Scramble for Tech Start-Ups
